definitions.definition: A companion in battle; fellow soldier.
A fellow socialist, communist or other similarly politically aligned person.
definitions.example: Hello, comrade. Are you going to the Communist Party meeting tonight?

definitions.definition: A gender-neutral title, functionally similar to "Mr.", "Mrs.", "Miss", "Ms." etc, in a communist or socialist state.
definitions.example: Comrade Lenin inspired our people to undertake great works.

definitions.definition: To associate with in a friendly way.
